an9.20:2.5: acittīkatvā → acittikatvā (bj, pts1) | apacittiṃ katvā (s1-3) | acittiṃ katvā (mr), apaviddhaṃ → apaviṭṭhaṃ (s1, s2)
an9.20:2.9: Evañhetaṃ → evañcetaṃ (s1-3, mr), asakkaccaṃ katānaṃ → asakkaccakatānaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1)
an9.20:4.3: hemajālappaṭicchannāni → hemajālasañchannāni (bj, pts1) | hemajālapaṭicchannāni (s1-3), āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalāyo → āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalāyo (bj), vissandanti → vissandati (si, pts1) | visandanti (s1-3)
an9.20:7.1: () → (yañca gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ) (bj, pts1)
an9.20:8.1: () → (yañca gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ) (bj, pts1)
an9.20:8.9: gandhohanamattampi → gandhūhanamattampi (bj) | gaddūhanamattampi (s1-3, pts1), () → (yo ca accharāsaṅghātamattampi aniccasaññaṃ bhāveyya) (mr)
